T17n2944u_001:6: yā kalpayantī ramate kavīnāṁ deṁvīṁ namasyāmi sarasvatīṁ tām || 2 ||
T17n2944u_001:18: śakrasya dasra iva gādhipurādhipasya śrīkṛṣṇa ityamalakīrttilatāvitānaḥ || 6 ||
T17n2944u_001:32: tasyātmajaḥ sarasakairavakāntakīrtiḥ śrīmānmaheśvara iti prathitaḥ kavīndraḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:42: viśvaprakāśa iti kāñcanabandhaśobhāṁ vibhranmayā'tra ghaṭito mukhakhaṇḍa epaḥ || 14 ||
T17n2944u_001:45: sevyaḥ kathaṁ naipa suvarṇaśailo viśvaprakāśo vibudhādhipānām || 15 ||
T17n2944u_001:51: sampādayanneṣyati vāñchitārthāna kathaṁ na cintāmaṇināṁ kavīnām || 17 ||
T17n2944u_001:54: ekatra sambhṛtamagocaraśabdaratna - mālokyatāṁ tadakhilaṁ sudhiyaḥ kavīndrāḥ || 18 ||
T17n2944u_001:56: yadyasti vāṅmayamahārṇavamanthanecchā prāptuṁ padaṁ phaṇipateryadi kautukaṁ vaḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:68: dṛṣṭāntena saha kkā'pi saptamyādhāra eva ca ||
T17n2944u_001:73: pāvake ca mayūre ca sukhaśīrṣajaleṣu kam || 24 ||
T17n2944u_001:76: akaṁ pāpe ca duḥkhe ca śako rājanyadeśayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:77: vakastu vakapuṣpe syāt kadhe śrīde ca rakṣasi || 25 ||
T17n2944u_001:79: śuko vyāsasute kīre rāvaṇasya ca mantriṇi ||
T17n2944u_001:80: granthiparṇe śirīṣe ca śukaṁ syācchoṇake kkacit || 26 ||
T17n2944u_001:82: dvikaḥ kāke ca koke ca sṛo bāṇānilotpale ||
T17n2944u_001:85: karkaḥ karke rāśibhede śuklāśve darpaṇe ghaṭe ||
T17n2944u_001:88: śloko yaśasi padye ca lokastu bhuvane jane ||
T17n2944u_001:95: reko vireke śaṅkāyāṁ rekaḥ syādavame'pi ca || 31 ||
T17n2944u_001:110: bhūkaśchidre ca kāle ca bheko maṇḍūkameghayoḥ || 36 ||
T17n2944u_001:136: muṣko'ṇḍakośe saṅghāte muṣko mokṣe ca pādaye ||
T17n2944u_001:137: kiṣkurvitastau haste ca prakoṣṭhe kutsite'pi ca || 45 ||
T17n2944u_001:139: trikākūpasya nemau syāt trikaṁ pṛṣṭhādhare traye ||
T17n2944u_001:142: śaṅkā trāse vitarke ca rākā tu saridantare ||
T17n2944u_001:150: pakṣibhede kare cāpi karakā ca ghanopale || 49 ||
T17n2944u_001:159: kṛṣakaḥ karṣake phāle rajako dhāvake śuke || 52 ||
T17n2944u_001:174: kaṅkume ca priyaṅgau ca pṛthukaścipiṭe śiśau || 57 ||
T17n2944u_001:215: tārakaḥ karṇadhāre syāddaitye ca dṛśi tārakam ||
T17n2944u_001:228: ānāye dambhabhede ca vastrabhede ca jālikā || 75 ||
T17n2944u_001:262: vipākaḥ kīrttyate svādau pariṇāme ca durgatau ||
T17n2944u_001:275: piśune śuni kāke ca kecakaḥ sektṛmeghayoḥ || 91 ||
T17n2944u_001:281: modako harṣake jñeyaḥ khādyabhede ca modakam || 93 ||
T17n2944u_001:293: lūnakaḥ syāt paśau bhinne śūcakaḥ prāvaṭe rase || 97 ||
T17n2944u_001:317: gairikaṁ kanake dhātau prasekaḥ secane cyutauḥ || 105 ||
T17n2944u_001:319: vaijike śigrutaile ca hetau sadyo'ṅkure'pi ca |
T17n2944u_001:334: abhīkaḥ kāmuke krūre kavau ca bhayavarjite ||
T17n2944u_001:337: anīkantu priye proktaṁ vyalīko nāgare smṛtaḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:353: ḍimbhe mūrkhe kṛśe bhrūṇe vartako'śvakhure khage || 117 ||
T17n2944u_001:356: kuberasya vimāne ca kāśīśe ca rasāṅjane || 118 ||
T17n2944u_001:389: mādreye ca karīre ca daivajñe ca prakīrttitam || 129 ||
T17n2944u_001:407: romāñce ca drumāṅge ca kaṇṭako makare'pi ca || 135 ||
T17n2944u_001:410: pakṣakaḥ pārśvamātre ca pakṣadvāre ca pakṣakaḥ || 136 ||
T17n2944u_001:412: śaṅkhakaṁ balaye kambau śiroroge ca śaṅkhakaḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:555: gokaṇṭako gokṣurake sthapuṭe ca gavāṁ khure || 185 ||
T17n2944u_001:564: vināyakastu herambe tārkṣye vijñe jine gurau || 188 ||
T17n2944u_001:569: dāserakaḥ syāt karabhe dāsīputre ca dhīvare ||
T17n2944u_001:662: khamindriye sukhe svarge śūnye bindau vihāyasi ||
T17n2944u_001:666: nakhaḥ kararuhe śaṇḍe gandhadravye nakhaṁ nakhī ||
T17n2944u_001:669: sukhaṁ śarmaṇi nāke ca sukhā puryāṁ pracetasaḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:679: sakhā mitre sahāye ca śākhāpakṣāntare bhuje ||
T17n2944u_001:699: agnimukho dvije deve bhallāte citrake kkacit ||
T17n2944u_001:709: vaddhaśikhā jaṭāyāṁ syād bāle baddhaśikho mataḥ || 15 ||
T17n2944u_001:720: gauḥ svarge vṛṣabhe raśmau vajre candramasi smṛtaḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:725: khagaḥ sūryye grahe deve mārgaṇe ca vihaṅgame || 2 ||
T17n2944u_001:736: bhṛguḥ śukre prapāte ca jamadagnau pinākini ||
T17n2944u_001:755: kārmmaṇe'pi ca yogaḥ syādrogaḥ kuṣṭhauṣadhe gade || 12 ||
T17n2944u_001:757: vego jave pravāhe ca mahākālaphale'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:770: laṅgaḥ saṅge ca ṣiṅge ca vyaṅgo hīnāṅgabhekayoḥ || 17 ||
T17n2944u_001:776: raṁṅgo raṇe khale rāge nṛtye raṅgaṁ trapunyapi || 19 ||
T17n2944u_001:787: piṅgaḥ piśaṅge piṅgī tu śamyāṁ piṅgantu vālake ||
T17n2944u_001:799: phalguḥ prokto male sāre niḥsāre phalgu vācyavat ||
T17n2944u_001:807: sarvagaṁ salile khyātaṁ sarvagaḥ śaṅkare vibhau || 29 ||
T17n2944u_001:822: prayogaḥ kārmaṇe proktaḥ prayuktau ca nidarśane || 34 ||
T17n2944u_001:876: īhāmṛgo vṛke jantau prabhede rūpakasya ca ||
T17n2944u_001:910: kṛṣṇāguruṇi śīghre ca spṛkkāyāñca smṛtā laghuḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:914: maghā mādhī ca nakṣetre bheṣaje ca yathākramam || 5 ||
T17n2944u_001:923: pratighaḥ pratighāte ca roṣe ca pratigho mataḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:935: kacaḥ keśe guroḥ putre bandhe śuṣkavraṇe kacaḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:936: kacā kariṇyāṁ kācastu manau śikye mṛdantare || 1 ||
T17n2944u_001:944: kūrcco vikatthane madhye bhruvoḥ śmaśruṇi kaitave ||
T17n2944u_001:954: vīciḥ svalpe taraṅge syādabakāśe sukhe'pi ca || 7 ||
T17n2944u_001:965: tvak carmavalkayo stvāce nyaṅ nīce nimnakārṇyayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:969: kavaco garddabhāṇḍe syāt sannāhe paṭahe'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:977: prapañcaḥ sañcaye prokto vistare ca pratāraṇe ||
T17n2944u_001:980: mārīco rakṣaso bhede kakkole yājake dvije ||
T17n2944u_001:991: śṛṅgāṭe śiśumāre ca kaṅke śeṭijhaṣe'pi ca || 19 ||
T17n2944u_001:1017: jo janyāṁ jātamātre ca mṛtyuñjaye janārddane ||
T17n2944u_001:1021: kañjaḥ keśe viriñcau ca kañjaḥ pīyūṣapadmayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:1022: ajo harau hare kāme vidhau chāge raghoḥ sute || 2 ||
T17n2944u_001:1024: vrajo goṣṭhādhvavṛndeṣu nijamātmīyanityayoḥ dhvajaṁ cihne patākāyāṁ dhvajaḥ śauṇḍikaśephayoḥ || 3 ||
T17n2944u_001:1026: khaṭvāṅge ca svajaṁ rakte svajaḥ prasvedaputrayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:1030: ādhāne'pi ca sajjaḥ syāt sannaddhe sambhṛte'pi ca || 5 ||
T17n2944u_001:1033: vājaṁ lake munau vājo vyājaḥ śāṭhayāpadeśayoḥ || 6 ||
T17n2944u_001:1035: bhujaḥ pāṇau ca bāhau ca kujaḥ syānnarakārayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:1038: abjaṁ syādatha kubjo'pi nyubjaḥ syāt pādapāntare ||
T17n2944u_001:1041: adhomukhe ca kubje ca nyubjo vācyavadiṣyate ||
T17n2944u_001:1042: ājiḥ samāvanau yuddhe rājiḥ syāt paṅktirephayoḥ || 9 ||
T17n2944u_001:1050: gañjaḥ kuñjo nikuñje'pi hanau dante ca dantinām ||
T17n2944u_001:1051: sañjaḥ prajāpatau rudre lañjaḥ syāt paṭṭakacchayoḥ || 12 ||
T17n2944u_001:1056: piñjo bale caye piñjaṁ rajjurveṇyāṁ guṇe smṛtā ||
T17n2944u_001:1057: kharjjūḥ kaṇḍvāñca kīṭe ca kharjūrīpādape'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:1074: vanajo mustake padme vanajaṁ vanajo gaje || 19 ||
T17n2944u_001:1091: aṇḍajaḥ kṛkalāse syāt khage mīne bhujaṅgame ||
T17n2944u_001:1094: phene ca karavāle ca parañjaḥ kṣurikāphale ||
T17n2944u_001:1099: droṇe ca vanakārpāsyāṁ bhāradvājī ca kathyate || 27 ||
T17n2944u_001:1105: kṣīrābdhijā śriyāṁ proktā candre kṣīrābdhijo bhavet || 29 ||
T17n2944u_001:1135: sarvajñaḥ śaṅkare buddhe kṛtajñaḥ kukkure'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:1141: samaye gajagaṇḍe ca pippalyāñca kaṭī matā || 1 ||
T17n2944u_001:1144: bhaṭaḥ pāmarabhede ca vīre ca pragame bhaṭiḥ || 2 ||
T17n2944u_001:1152: paṭaḥ priyālavṛkṣe ca sucele ca puraskṛtau ||
T17n2944u_001:1155: vaṭo gole gule bhakṣe vaṭo sāmyavarāṭayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:1158: viṭo'drau lavaṇe piṅge mūṣake khadire'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:1159: sphuṭo vyakte praphulle ca vyāpte ca kalite'nyavat || 7 ||
T17n2944u_001:1165: puradvāre ca śaṁsanti lāṭo deśeṁ'śuke'pi ca || 9 ||
T17n2944u_001:1168: vaṭo vṛtau ca mārge'pi vāṭī tu gṛhaniṣkuṭe || 10 ||
T17n2944u_001:1171: kaṭuḥ sugandhe tīkṣṇe syādakārye makṣare rase || 11 ||
T17n2944u_001:1179: aṭṭaṁ bhakte ca śuṣke ca kṣaume'tyarthe gṛhāntare ||
T17n2944u_001:1188: iṣṭaṁ saṁskārayoge ca yāge ca kratukarmaṇi ||
T17n2944u_001:1192: diṣṭaṁ daiva ca lāke syāddiṣṭaḥ sṛṣṭaṁ tu nirmite || 18 ||
T17n2944u_001:1197: vyuṣṭaṁ dine prabhāte ca phale paryupite'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:1201: viṣṭiḥ karmakare bhadre prepaṇe vetane'pi ca || 21 ||
T17n2944u_001:1204: riṣṭiḥ khaḍge samṛddhau ca kṛṣṭiḥ syāt karṣaṇe budhe || 22 ||
T17n2944u_001:1206: sṛṣṭiḥ svabhāve nirmāṇe puṣṭirvṛddhau ca poṣaṇe ||
T17n2944u_001:1215: ghoṇṭā syād badare pūge ghaṭīkhaṇḍe ca vāsasaḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:1228: avaṭaḥ syāt khile gartte kūpe kuhakajīvini ||
T17n2944u_001:1291: satīlake ca tīre ca tripuṭaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ || 51 ||
T17n2944u_001:1324: pratikṛṣṭaṁ mataṁ guhye dvirāvṛttyā ca karṣite |
T17n2944u_001:1325: pratikṛṣṭaḥ preṣite syāt pratyākhyāte ca bācyavat || 62 ||
T17n2944u_001:1337: munāvapi haṭho vāriparṇyāṁ syāt prasabhe'pi ca || 1 ||
T17n2944u_001:1340: śaṭho'lase ca mūrkhe ca kuṇṭho karmaṇyamūrkhayoḥ || 2 ||
T17n2944u_001:1342: pāṁthaḥ syātt paṭhane viddhakarṇyāṁ pāṭhā'pi paṭhayate ||
T17n2944u_001:1349: kuṣṭho roge sugandhe ca goṣṭhaṁ gosthānake'pi ca || 5 ||
T17n2944u_001:1351: goṣṭhī sabhāyāṁ saṁlāpe duṣṭhuḥ syād durbale'dhame ||
T17n2944u_001:1354: jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhe'tivṛddhe ca jyeṣṭho māsāntare'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:1364: kamaṭhaḥ kacchape bhāṇḍabhede ca kamaṭhaṁ matam ||
T17n2944u_001:1406: jaḍo mūrkhe himagnaste śūkaśimbyāṁ jaḍā matā ||
T17n2944u_001:1407: gaḍuḥ puṣṭaguḍe kubje ṣaḍaḥ peyāntare bhidi || 2 ||
T17n2944u_001:1413: kroḍaḥ sūkarapātaṅgayoḥ kroḍaṁ krauḍe ca vakṣasi || 4 ||
T17n2944u_001:1416: kṣveḍaḥ karṇāmaye dhvāne garale kuṭile'pi ca || 5 ||
T17n2944u_001:1421: aṇḍaṁ khagādikośe syānmuṣke vīrye'pi ca kkacit ||
T17n2944u_001:1424: gaṇḍaḥ kapole piṭake yogabhede ca gaṇḍake ||
T17n2944u_001:1427: caṇḍo daityāntare tīvre caṇḍo dāse yamasya ca ||
T17n2944u_001:1434: kuṇḍī kuṇḍaḥ smṛto jārāt pativatnīsute'pi ca || 11 ||
T17n2944u_001:1440: gauḍaḥ pāmarajātau ca vṛddhanābhau ca vācyavat || 13 ||
T17n2944u_001:1442: piṇḍaṁ sāndre balaṁ vole gṛhāṁśe jīvanāyasoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:1443: piṇḍo dehe javāpuṣpe nivāpe sihlake'pi ca || 14 ||
T17n2944u_001:1446: paṇḍaḥ pāṇḍe dhiyāṁ paṇḍā pāṇḍuḥ kuntīpatau site || 15 ||
T17n2944u_001:1448: maṇḍaṁ mastuni śāke ca maṇḍaḥ syāt sārapicchayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:1460: iḍā vāci gavi kṣoṇāviḍā ca budhayoṣiti ||
T17n2944u_001:1495: kūṣmāṇḍo gaṇabhede syād bhrūṇe karkkāruke'pi ca || 31 ||
T17n2944u_001:1524: dṛḍhaḥ sthūle bhṛśe śakte pragāḍhe'pi dṛḍho mataḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:1527: gūḍhaṁ rahasi guhye ca saṁvṛte punaranyavat ||
T17n2944u_001:1538: pañjare pāvake vātha prarūḍho jaṭhare smṛtaḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:1544: nigūḍho garhite gupte pramīḍho mūtrite ghane ||
T17n2944u_001:1559: ghrāṇaṁ ghrāte ca nāsāyāṁ kāṇaḥ kākaikacakṣuṣoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:1562: vāṇā jhiṇṭayāṁ matā dhīraiḥ śaṇī māsacatuṣṭaye ||
T17n2944u_001:1565: trāṇā tu trāyamānāyāṁ rakṣite rakṣaṇe'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:1569: druṇaṁ cāpe ca khaḍge ca druṇo vṛścikabhṛṅgayoḥ || 6 ||
T17n2944u_001:1590: jarṇaścandre ca vṛkṣe ca varṇaḥ kāñcanayajñayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:1594: parṇaṁ syāt kiṁśuke patre śīrṇaṁ tanuviśīrṇayoḥ || 14 ||
T17n2944u_001:1596: pūrṇaḥ śabde samagre ca pūrite cāpi vācyavat ||
T17n2944u_001:1600: jīrṇaṁ pakke purāṇe ca kīrṇaṁ dāritabhītayoḥ || 16 ||
T17n2944u_001:1602: uṣṇaḥ syādātape grīṣme dakṣe kṛṣṇastu keśave ||
T17n2944u_001:1608: jitvare cātha viṣṇuḥ syāt kṛṣṇe'rke vasudaivate ||
T17n2944u_001:1623: śreṇiḥ paṅktau sekapātre śreṇiḥ syāt kārusaṁhatau ||
T17n2944u_001:1626: veṇī kacasya bandhe syānnadīnāṁ melake'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:1627: devatāḍe ca tīṇī tu nīlyāṁ tūṇau niṣaṅgake || 25 ||
T17n2944u_001:1630: śrāṇā yavāgvāṁ pakke tu śrāṇaṁ sthūṇā'yasaḥ smṛtā || 26 ||
T17n2944u_001:1633: veṇurbhūpāntare vaṁśe sthāṇuḥ kīle sthite hare || 27 ||
T17n2944u_001:1642: karuṇastu rase vṛkṣe kṛpāyāṁ karuṇā matā ||
T17n2944u_001:1643: varuṇaḥ sammato nīre svarloke parameṣṭhini || 30 || pṁ |
T17n2944u_001:1650: caraṇaṁ bahṛcādau syānmūle gotre pade'pi ca || 32 ||
T17n2944u_001:1658: bālavādau ca karaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ śūdrāviśoḥ sute ||
T17n2944u_001:1662: ramaṇaṁ syāt paṭolasya mūle'pi ramaṇaḥ priye || 36 ||
T17n2944u_001:1670: drughaṇo mudgare'pi syād drughaṇā ca paraśvadhe ||
T17n2944u_001:1677: īkṣaṇaṁ darśane dṛṣṭau prokṣaṇaṁ secane vadhe || 41 ||
T17n2944u_001:1679: lakṣaṇaṁ nāmni cihne ca saumitre cā'pi lakṣaṇaḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:1688: masṛṇaḥ karkaśe snigdhe kṣumāyāṁ masṛṇā bhavet ||
T17n2944u_001:1692: dharṣaṇaṁ syāt paribhave rate'satyāṁ tu dharṣaṇī || 46 ||
T17n2944u_001:1697: hiraṇaṁ retasi svarṇe varāṭe ca hiraṇyavat ||
T17n2944u_001:1712: kṛpāṇo'sau kṛpāṇī tu churikāyāṁ ca kartarau ||
T17n2944u_001:1725: daurvāṇaṁ naṣṭaparṇe syād dūrvāyāḥ svarase'pi ca || 57 ||
T17n2944u_001:1748: paśoḥ śṛṅge piṣāṇāṁ tu meṣaśṛṅgayāṁ prakīrttitā ||
T17n2944u_001:1775: bharaṇī śoṇake ṛkṣe bharaṇaṁ vetane bhṛtau ||
T17n2944u_001:1796: vipre tu brāhmaṇo vede brāhmaṇaṁ dvijasaṁhatau ||
T17n2944u_001:1821: vidāraṇaṁ raṇe bhede viḍambe ca vidāraṇam ||
T17n2944u_001:1831: parīraṇaḥ syāt kamaṭhe daṇḍe ca paṭṭaśāṭake || 92 ||
T17n2944u_001:1833: samīraṇaḥ syāt pavane pathike ca phaṇijjhake ||
T17n2944u_001:1882: kāṇḍe ca karapatre ca kūṭe ca śarasaṅkrame ||
T17n2944u_001:1893: tataṁ vīṇādivādye ca pavamāne tataḥ punaḥ || 1 ||
T17n2944u_001:1898: kṛtaṁ yuge'pi paryāpte vihite hiṁsite phale ||
T17n2944u_001:1899: ghṛtamājye pradīpte ca salile ca ghṛtaṁ matam || 3 ||
T17n2944u_001:1904: dhutaṁ tyakte vidhūte ca dhūtaṁ kampitabhartsite ||

T17n2944u_001:3732: dharā medhasi bhūmyāñca strīṇāṁ garbhāśaye'pi ca || 10 ||
T17n2944u_001:3734: kṣaraṁ nīre kṣaro meghe daraḥ sādhvasagarttayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:3740: puraṁ puri śarīre ca guggulau kathitaḥ puraḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:3743: suro deve surā madye caṣake'pi surā kkacit ||
T17n2944u_001:3744: kāro vadhe niścaye ca balau yatne yatāvapi || 14 ||
T17n2944u_001:3764: māro mṛtyau vṛṣe'naṅge mārī caṇḍayāṁ janakṣaye ||
T17n2944u_001:3771: sāro bale majjani ca sthirāṁśe nyāyye ca nīre ca dhane ca sāram ||
T17n2944u_001:3775: cirantu gostane haste cūḍāyāṁ sīsake'pi ca || 24 ||
T17n2944u_001:3780: tīraṁ taṭe trapau tīraḥ sīrastigmakare hale ||
T17n2944u_001:3784: kṣīraṁ nīre ca dugdhe ca kīro janapade śuke || 27 ||
T17n2944u_001:3789: gauraḥ śaśini gaurī tu nagnakanyomayoḥ smṛtā ||
T17n2944u_001:3795: veraṁ śarīre kāśmīre veraṁ vātiṅgaṇe'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:3801: gotraṁ nāmni kule kṣetre kānane cittavartmanoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:3807: patraṁ syādvāhane parṇe pakṣe ca śarapakṣiṇām ||
T17n2944u_001:3811: potraṁ vastre mukhāgre ca śūkarasya halasya ca || 36 ||
T17n2944u_001:3819: vṛtro ripau dhane dhvānte śaile śakre ca dānave ||
T17n2944u_001:3829: astraṁ praharaṇe cāpe vaktraṁ chando'ntare mukhe || 42 ||
T17n2944u_001:3832: netraṁ rathe ca nāḍayāñca netro netari vācyavat || 43 ||
T17n2944u_001:3838: guptavāde ca totrantu prājane vallave'pi ca || 45 ||
T17n2944u_001:3840: tantraṁ kuṭumbakṛtye syāt kāraṇe ca paricchade ||
T17n2944u_001:3859: vakraḥ syāt kuṭile krūre puṭabhede śanaiścare || 52 ||
T17n2944u_001:3873: kṣudraḥ syādadhame krūre kṛpaṇe'lpe ca vācyavat ||
T17n2944u_001:3882: nīdhraṁ nemau valīkendvo revatībhe ca kānane ||
T17n2944u_001:3910: vāśro'pi divase vāśraṁ mandire ca catuṣpathe || 69 ||
T17n2944u_001:3916: abhraṁ nabhaḥ svargavalāhakeṣu śubhraṁ pradīpte dhavale'bhrae ca ||
T17n2944u_001:3917: vabhrurviśāle nakule kṛśānau vajre munau śūlini piṅgale ca || 71 ||
T17n2944u_001:3922: kharurdante hare darpe haye śvete tu vācyavat ||
T17n2944u_001:3955: uṣṭrī golakikāyāṁ syāt karabhasya ca yoṣiti ||
T17n2944u_001:3974: vīrastu subhaṭe śreṣṭhe vīraṁ śṛṅgayāṁ nate'pi ca || 91 ||
T17n2944u_001:4004: pravaraṁ santatau gotre śreṣṭhe tu pravaro'nyavat ||
T17n2944u_001:4007: ambaraṁ vāsasi vyomni kārpāse ca sugandhake ||
T17n2944u_001:4028: krakaraḥ krakace dīne karīre ca khagāntare ||
T17n2944u_001:4034: pradaro rogabhede syāt pradaraḥ śara bhaṅgayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:4053: prasaraḥ praṇaye vege saṅgare cā'tha matsaraḥ || 117 ||
T17n2944u_001:4082: ajiraṁ prāṅgaṇe vāte viṣaye dardure tanau ||
T17n2944u_001:4089: suṣiro'gnau ca timiraṁ dhvānte netrāmaye'pi ca || 129 ||
T17n2944u_001:4103: bandhūrabandhurau ramye namre haṁse tu bandhuraḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:4127: jarjharaḥ syāt kaliyuge vādye bhāṇḍe nadāntare ||
T17n2944u_001:4140: puñjaraṁ kanake vājibhede pīte ca piñjaraḥ || 146 ||
T17n2944u_001:4143: mandaro bahale mande kandaro vivare kuśe || 147 ||
T17n2944u_001:4151: vallakṣetre ca mañjaryyāṁ vallarī tu prakīrttitā ||
T17n2944u_001:4152: mantharaḥ sūcake koṭhe manthāne cā'tha mantharam || 150 ||
T17n2944u_001:4154: kusumbhyāṁ mantharo mande pṛthau vakre ca vācyavat ||
T17n2944u_001:4163: puṣkaraṁ tūryavaktre ca kāṇḍe khaṅgaphale'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:4191: vāgaro vārake śāṇe nirjhare vāḍave vṛke || 163 ||
T17n2944u_001:4193: viśārade mumukṣau ca gavāmaṅke ca vāgaram ||
T17n2944u_001:4209: madāro dvirade dhūrtte vidāro dāraṇe raṇe ||
T17n2944u_001:4216: vismaye ca prasiddhau ca daṇḍāraḥ śarayantrake || 171 ||
T17n2944u_001:4221: tuṣāro himabhede ca makare'pi hime'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:4225: śuke ca varuṇadrau ca kumāraṁ jātyakāñcane || 174 ||
T17n2944u_001:4233: kuṭāraṁ maithune vidyāt kuṭāraṁ kevale'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:4236: kaḍāraḥ piṅgale dāse sambhāraḥ sambhṛtau gaṇe ||
T17n2944u_001:4246: p ṁ 60 śālmalī tarubhede syāddīpabhede ca śālmalī || 133 ||
T17n2944u_001:4251: kāhalī tu taruṇyāṁ syāt kāhalaṁ bhṛśaśuṣkayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:4295: smṛtaḥ poṭagalaḥ kāśe nale poṭagalo jhaṣe || 149 ||
T17n2944u_001:4316: gandhaphalī priyaṅgau syāt korake campakasya ca || 156 ||
T17n2944u_001:4338: dhavaḥ patyau nare dhūrtte vṛkṣabhede'pi kīrttitaḥ || 3 ||
T17n2944u_001:4340: javo vegini vege syādoṇḍrapuṣpe javā matā ||
T17n2944u_001:4341: lavo leśe vināśe ca chedane rāmanandane || 4 ||
T17n2944u_001:4343: plavaḥ kāraṇḍave bheke kulake bhelake kapau ||
T17n2944u_001:4347: havo yajñe tathāhlāne nideśe'pi havo mataḥ || 6 ||
T17n2944u_001:4349: śavo mṛte śavaṁ nīre savaḥ sandhānayajñayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:4350: kṣavaḥ kṣute rājikāyāṁ navaṁ navye stave viduḥ || 7 ||
T17n2944u_001:4352: dhruvaḥ kīle śive śaṅkau vasau yoge vaṭe munau ||
T17n2944u_001:4358: śivaṁ mokṣe sukhe bhadre salile'tha śivo hare ||
T17n2944u_001:4359: vede yogāntare kīle vāluke guggule'pi ca || 10 ||
T17n2944u_001:4377: ātmatve vyavasāye ca citte prāṇeṣu jantuṣu || 16 ||
T17n2944u_001:4379: sāntvaṁ sāmani dākṣiṇye kaṇvaṁ pāpe munau biduḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:4380: kiṇvaṁ pāpe surābīje bilvantu śrīphale phale || 17 ||
T17n2944u_001:4395: divaṁ dyauḥ svargaloke ca gagane ca prayujyate || 22 ||
T17n2944u_001:4417: tokotpāde ca sacivaḥ sahāye mantriṇi smṛtaḥ || 29 ||
T17n2944u_001:4423: pallavaḥ syāt kisalaye viṭape vistare bale || 31 ||
T17n2944u_001:4426: yuddhe ca puṅgavaḥ śreṣṭhe vṛṣabhe bheṣajāntare || 32 ||
T17n2944u_001:4434: rauravo narake ghore kairavaḥ kitave ripau ||
T17n2944u_001:4443: āśravaḥ syāt pratijñāne kleśe ca vacanasthite ||
T17n2944u_001:4476: gāṇḍīvaṁ gāṇḍivaṁ jiṣṇoḥ kodaṇḍe kārmuke'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:4522: śaṁ sukhe śarmaṇi proktaṁ śreyasi śaśca śastrake ||
T17n2944u_001:4526: kuśo rāmasute darbhe yoktre dvīpe kuśaṁ jale ||
T17n2944u_001:4530: śaśo gandharase lodhre syāt paśau puruṣāntare || 3 ||
T17n2944u_001:4535: sparśo rujāyāṁ dāne ca sparśane sparśake'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:4542: kāśastṛṇe syāt kṣavathau vārāṇasyāṁ tu kāśyapi || 7 ||
T17n2944u_001:4544: keśo daityāntare bāle hrīvere ca pracetasi ||
T17n2944u_001:4545: kīśo digambare proktaḥ kīśaḥ śākhāmṛge'pi ca || 8 ||
T17n2944u_001:4550: kleśo duḥkhe'pi rāgādau vyavasāye'pi ca kkacit ||
T17n2944u_001:4551: vaṁśo veṇau kule varge pṛṣṭhasyāvayave'pi ca || 10 ||
T17n2944u_001:4553: daṁśaḥ syāt khaṇḍane doṣe daṁśo marmaṇi kīrttitaḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:4559: dṛgdarśane locane ca dṛgbuddhau bīkṣake'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:4569: kapiśaḥ sihlake śyāve mādhavyāṁ kapiśī matā ||
T17n2944u_001:4584: nīkāśo niścaye tulye hatāśo nirddaye khale ||
T17n2944u_001:4591: palāśaḥ kiṁśuke śaṭayāṁ harite rākṣase'pi ca || 23 ||
T17n2944u_001:4593: patre palāśaṁ saṁveśaḥ śayane cāsane'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:4596: nirveśo mūrcchane bhoge nirveśo vetane'pi ca ||
T17n2944u_001:4603: karkaśaḥ paruṣe krūre kṛpaṇe nirddaye dṛḍhe || 27 ||
T17n2944u_001:4616: bhūkeśī valvajeṣu syād bhūkeśaḥ śaivale vaṭe || 31 ||
T17n2944u_001:4648: vṛṣaḥ syādvāsake dharme saurabheye ca śukrale ||
T17n2944u_001:4657: varṣaṁ saṁvatsare vṛṣṭau jambūdvīpe dhane viduḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:4658: prāvṛṭkāle tu varṣāḥ syuḥ karṣaḥ karṣaṇamānayoḥ || 4 ||
T17n2944u_001:4667: doṣaḥ syād dūṣaṇe pāpe doṣā rātrau bhuje'pi ca || 7 ||
T17n2944u_001:4678: tviṭ kāntau vyavasāye ca jigīṣāyāṁ rucau giri ||
T17n2944u_001:4679: viṭ vyāpane ca viṣṭhāyāṁ śuṣiḥ śoṣe vile'pi || 11 ||
T17n2944u_001:4701: kulmāṣo yāvake proktaḥ kulmāṁṣa kāñjike'pi ca || 18 ||
T17n2944u_001:4709: pradopaḥ kālabhede syāt pradoṣo doṣa iṣyate ||
T17n2944u_001:4754: śṛṅgārādau drave vīrye dehadhātau ca pārade || 1 ||
T17n2944u_001:4760: dāsī ceṭayāñca jhiṇṭayāñca rāsaḥ kolāhale dhvanau || 3 ||
T17n2944u_001:4765: bhāḥ prabhāve mayūkhe ca māḥ smṛtaścandramāsayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:4778: aṁsaḥ skandhe vibhāge ca kaṁso daityāntare smṛtaḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:4779: kāṁsye ca kāṁsyapātre ca mānabhede'pi kīrttitaḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:4799: surasaḥ syāt sumadhure parṇāse surasā'pi ca || 15 ||
T17n2944u_001:4808: autsukye ca samāsastu saṁkṣepe ca samarthane || 18 ||
T17n2944u_001:4831: jyāyān vṛddhe ca śaste ca havirhotavyasarpiṣoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:4832: repāḥ syādadhame krūre kṛpaṇe'pi ca kathyate || 26 ||
T17n2944u_001:4835: varcco dīptau purīṣe ca varcco rūpe'pi ca kkacit || 27 ||
T17n2944u_001:4837: chandaḥ padye ca vede ca svairācārābhilāṣayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:4840: rodaśca rodasī cā'pi divi bhūmau pṛthak pṛthak ||
T17n2944u_001:4844: bhujo bale ca dīptau ca tejo dhānmi parākrame || 30 ||
T17n2944u_001:4847: rajaḥ parge reṇau tu rajavat parikīrttitam || 31 ||
T17n2944u_001:4852: śreyastu maṅgale dharme śreyān śaste tu vācyavat ||
T17n2944u_001:4861: uṣaḥ prabhāte sandhyāyāmuraḥ śreṣthe ca vakṣasi ||
T17n2944u_001:4864: nabho vyāmni nabhā medhe śrāvaṇe ca patadgrahe ||
T17n2944u_001:4865: ghrāṇe mṛṇālasūtre ca varṣāsu ca nabhāḥ smṛtaḥ || 37 ||
T17n2944u_001:4867: taro bale ca vege ca retaḥ śukre ca pārade ||
T17n2944u_001:4870: saho bale jyotiṣi mārgaśīrṣa - hemantayoścā'pi sahaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:4871: raho'pi guhye surate ca tattve maho bhavedutsavatejasośca || 39 ||
T17n2944u_001:4873: jyotiḥ prakāśe dṛśi tārakāsu jyotirdineśānalayorapi syāt ||
T17n2944u_001:4877: rākṣasīti ca daṁṣṭrāyāṁ rākṣasī rakṣasaḥ striyām || 41 ||
T17n2944u_001:4879: tāmasīti ca durgāyāṁ tāmaso bhujage khale ||
T17n2944u_001:4895: śvaḥśreyasañca bhadre syāt parānande ca śarmaṇi ||
T17n2944u_001:4916: smṛtā madhurasā drākṣā mūrvikā dugdhikāsu ca ||
T17n2944u_001:4948: sahā devīkumāryośca sahaḥ kānte sahā bhuvi || 1 ||
T17n2944u_001:4954: barhaṁ dale kekipicche gṛhāḥ patnyāṁ gṛhe smṛtāḥ || 3 ||
T17n2944u_001:4962: pṁ 80 lohastu śastrake lihaṁ joṅgake sarvataijase ||
T17n2944u_001:4971: guhā tu gahrare siṁhapucchayāṁ skande guho mataḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:4972: vāho bhujāyāṁ vāhastu mānabhede vṛṣe haye || 9 ||
T17n2944u_001:4974: mahī bhūmau mahī nadyāṁ maha utsavatejasoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:4994: kaṭāhaḥ kūrmapṛṣṭhe ca stūpe ca mahiṣīśiśau || 16 ||
T17n2944u_001:5040: gandhavahā tu nāsāyāṁ vāyau gandhavaho mataḥ || 31 ||
T17n2944u_001:5051: akṣaḥ karṣe tuṣe cakre śakaṭe vyavahārayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:5055: ṛkṣamuktañca nakṣatre yakṣaḥ śrīde ca guhyake || 3 ||
T17n2944u_001:5058: munibhede drume vahnau dakṣo dakṣā bhuvi smṛtā || 4 ||
T17n2944u_001:5064: lakṣaṁ śaravye saṅkhayāyāṁ lakṣaṁ chadmani kathyate || 6 ||
T17n2944u_001:5070: cokṣo gīte śucau dakṣe tathā tīkṣṇamanojñayoḥ || 8 ||
T17n2944u_001:5110: iti śrīsakalavaidyarājacakramuktāśekharasya gadyapadyavidyānidheḥ śrīmaheśvarasya kṛtau viśvaprakāśe anekārthaśabda- paricchedaḥ prathamaḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:5123: ā pragṛhyaḥ smṛtau vākye āḥ syāt santāpakoṣayoḥ || i ||
T17n2944u_001:5125: i khede ca rūṣoktau ca kāmadeve tvanavyayam || 3 || ī ||
T17n2944u_001:5128: ī duḥkhabhāvane kope lakṣmyāmīḥ syādanavyayam || u ||
T17n2944u_001:5130: u sambuddhau ruṣoktau ca śambhuvācī tvanavyayam || 4 || ū ||
T17n2944u_001:5134: ṛ ṛ vākye cā'pi kutsāyāṁ devāmbāyāntvanavyayam | 5 ||
T17n2944u_001:5142: ku pāpe ceṣadartha ca kutsāyāñca nivāraṇe ||
T17n2944u_001:5143: manāgalpe ca mande ca dhig nirbhartsananindayoḥ || 7 ||
T17n2944u_001:5146: aṅga sambodhaṁne harṣe punararthe ca kīrttitam ||
T17n2944u_001:5148: tiryak tiro'rthe vakre ca vihaṅgādau tvanavyayam || 8 ||
T17n2944u_001:5173: kiṁsvit praśne vitarke ca śaśvat punaḥsadārthayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:5190: ānantarye kutaḥ praśne pañcamyarthe ca nihnave || 20 ||
T17n2944u_001:5193: pañcamyarthe tataḥ proktaṁ pañcamyarthe ca śāsane || 21 ||
T17n2944u_001:5207: anantare ca kārtsnye ca saṁśaye ca prakīrtitaḥ || 26 ||
T17n2944u_001:5230: anu hīne sahārthe ca paścāt sādṛśyayoranu || 33 ||
T17n2944u_001:5237: nityārthe saṁyame cā'pi kṣepārthe'pi ca viśrutam || 35 ||
T17n2944u_001:5268: sāmprataṁ cādhunārthe syād yuktārthe'pi ca sāmpratam ||
T17n2944u_001:5272: kuṁ praśne'pi ruṣoktau ca prādhvaṁ namrānukūlayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:5279: alaṁ śaktau ca nirddiṣṭaṁ śaṁ kalyāṇe sukhe'pi ca || 48 ||
T17n2944u_001:5284: tūṣṇīkaṁ tu smṛtaṁ maune maunaśīle tvanavyayam ||
T17n2944u_001:5288: abhīkṣṇaṁ tu tathāpaunaḥpunye syāt santate'pi ca || 51 ||
T17n2944u_001:5291: kathaṁ praśne sambhrame ca prakārārthe ca sambhave || 52 ||
T17n2944u_001:5293: kimu sambhāvanāyāṁ syādvimarṣe ca kimu smṛtam ||
T17n2944u_001:5298: aye krodhe viṣāde ca sambhrame smaraṇe'pi ca || 54 ||
T17n2944u_001:5301: pra prakarṣe gatādyarthe duḥ syāt kaṣṭaniṣedhayoḥ ||
T17n2944u_001:5305: ābhimukhye bhṛṣārthe ca vikrame ca gatau vadhe || 56 ||
T17n2944u_001:5313: prāduḥ prākāśyavṛttau syāt sambhāvye ca prayujyate ||
T17n2944u_001:5324: niṣedhane'pi vīpsāyāṁ khalu māne ca kīrttitam || 62 ||
T17n2944u_001:5341: bhūyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ khyātaṁ prabhūtārthe tvanavyayam || 67 ||
T17n2944u_001:5351: hā viṣāde ca śoke ca duḥkhārthe'pi ca kathyate || 70 ||
T17n2944u_001:5356: hāhā duḥkhe huhū harṣe gandharve'mū tvanavyaye ||
T17n2944u_001:5357: he hai vyastau samastau ca hūtisambodhanārthayoḥ || 72 ||
T17n2944u_001:5367: kṣāntāḥ maṅkṣu śīghre bhṛṣārthe ca tattvārthe'pi kkacinmatam || 75 ||
T17n2944u_001:5379: etāṁ kṛtiṁ kṛtadhiyaḥ kṛtakṛtyabhāva - māpādayantu sadayaṁ,
T17n2944u_001:5381: nityaṁ maheśvarakaveḥ paribhāvayantaḥ santaḥ paronnatiratā hi bhavanti loke || 4 ||
T17n2944u_001:5386: iti śrīsakalavaidyarājacakramuktāśekharasya gadyapadyavidyānidheḥ śrīmaheśvarasya kṛtau viśvaprakāśe anekārthāvyayaparicchedo dvitīyaḥ ||
